name: Sang Won Lee 0002
content: Sang Won Lee Sang Won Lee's website computer music, human computer interaction, live coding. email : Hi, I am an assistant professor in Computer Science at Virginia Tech. I received a Ph.D. in Computer Science at the University of Michigan, advised by Prof. Walter Lasecki and Prof. Georg Essl. I earned my B.Sc. in Industrial Engineering from Seoul National University, Master of Science in Music Technology from Georgia Tech. I am looking for exceptional undergraduates, Master's students, Ph.D. students, and post-docs with strong technical skills who are interested in creating novel interactive systems that can facilitate collaboration, creativity, and empathy. I also create novel interactive music systems that enable new musical aesthetic. Drop me an email if you think you are the one. Drop me an email if you think you are the one.
